text: Joseph H. Boardman (December 23, 1948 â€“ March 7, 2019) was an American railroad executive. He was the President and CEO of Amtrak from 2008 to 2016. He was born in Taberg, New York. Boardman suffered a stroke while on vacation in Florida on March 5, and died on March 7, 2019. He was aged 70. == References == Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American chief executives Category:United States Department of Transportation Category:Amtrak Category:Republicans (United States) Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Cornell University alumni Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Military people from New York (state)
title: Joseph H. Boardman
